creator: TRASSIR Ltd
descriptionHtml:
TRASSIR Client app is unique and It`s a kind of one-stop solution, allows you to enter the world of the TRASSIR Cloud professional ecosystem. It coherently reconciles a video server and the surveillance cameras, and allows you effectively manage the multiple process of cyber-infrastructure not only of modern business, but also a "smart" home.
TRASSIR Client as a business app for video surveillance has dozens of functions, each of which is aimed at improving the efficiency of any business` branch. Tens of thousands of application downloading affirm the confidence of the business representatives.
Right now with TRASSIR Client app you can connect and view tens or hundreds of cameras, because it is perfectly integrated into TRASSIR Cloud. Control the situation in the company and at home, get the notifications from the cameras, see high-quality images, even with  low-level communication channels. And even when there is no an internet around! Amazing, isn`t it?

Be assured at complete secure of video transmission and storage, because TRASSIR Client app transmits all data only in encrypted protocols SSL / TLS that are used at data storage in financial companies. With TRASSIR Client app watch the videos in the Cloud wherever you need - all records are available by 2 clicks directly on your phone!

More reasons to download TRASSIR Client app right now:

* Displays real-time video of any resolution
* Archive playback from any device and from Cloud
* Ability to display simultaneously up to 16 cameras
* Supports dual stream video playback, independent selection of the stream for each channel
* Displays system health indicators for servers and cameras
* Digital zoom
* Screenshots
* PTZ management, including presets usage
* Alarm inputs management for IP cameras
* Connects camera to the Сloud Via the QR code or WiFi
* Duplex audio communication with IP camera
* Cloud sign-in using Google account
descriptionShort: Watch live video even if the speed of your internet connection is not very fast.

title: Video Surveillance TRASSIR

creator: TRASSIR Ltd
descriptionHtml:
TRASSIR is an application for organizing remote video surveillance from cameras, both with direct connection to the Internet and Wi-Fi connection.
The functionality of the application not only meets the video surveillance challenges for private use, but also fully covers the needs of business as a video analytics and archive management tool.

Use TRASSIR to view video in the “cloud” - recordings are available in 2 clicks on your smartphone and tablet.

TRASSIR application features:
* High resolution video display in real time;
* Simultaneous display of up to 16 cameras on the screen;
* Secure storage of camera recordings in the cloud with up to 120 days of archive depth;
* Easy navigation to find videos in the archive;
* Receiving notifications on detected motion in a frame;
* Obtaining the states of the equipment health indicators;
* Digital Zoom;
* Support of 2 video streams, independent stream selection for each channel;
* Management of IP cameras and IP devices alarm outputs;
* Connecting cameras to the cloud (via QR code or WiFi) ;
* Two-way audio communication with cameras;
* Additional authorization in the application via Face ID, fingerprint or PIN code.
descriptionShort: Watch live video even if the speed of your internet connection is not very fast.
